category.option: The response is not a satisfactory answer to the question. It either fails to address the question or does so in a limited way, with no evidence of higher-order thinking.
The response is a marginal answer to the question. It may contain some elements of a proficient response, but it is inaccurate or incomplete.
The response is a proficient answer to the question. It is generally correct, although it may contain minor inaccuracies. There is limited evidence of higher-order thinking.
The response is correct, complete, and contains evidence of higher-order thinking.
